Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Alpha', 3: "You'll never keep up with a Construct, no matter how much you practice.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "I don't have the time for that. I just happened to see you practice swordplay secretly on your own that one time.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'It took me one look to know whether it was spur-of-the-moment or a lifelong dedication.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'As expected, it will take me less than a move to take you down in a direct confrontation.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "I didn't mean you're weak. Force is only one form of power.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'You must seek your own strength. I have no intention to guide my enemy, but... I look forward to the day you flourish.', 4: '1'}
